name: Planet Run 3D
description:
Grow your own solar system by collecting stars and planets. Use upgrades to increase the size of your sun and add moons to it's orbit. Watch out for asteroids that'll knock you off course and make you lose points. You can fly into black holes that force you to sail through space at warp speed.

How to play:
1. Swipe your finger across the screen to move left or right.
2. Level up by collecting 10 stars. You can gain up to 3 levels per stage.
3. You can align collected planets at the end of the stage for bonus points.
4. Black holes double your speed and make you invincible momentarily.
